# AudioPlayer

ExiledSL mod that plays audio.

Permissions:
```
audioplayer.play
audioplayer.stop
audioplayer.loop
```
CONVERSION PARAMETTERS
```
ffmpeg.exe -re -i AudioFile.wav -f f32le -ar 48000 -ac 1 output.raw
```
